requirements.description: You will provide and adhere to a published privacy policy for your Application

type.summary: Provide and follow a privacy policy

requirements.description: The privacy policy must be easily accessible and conspicuously linked from the Application

type.summary: Accessibility and visibility of privacy policy

requirements.description: The privacy policy must incorporate by reference and link to the Snap Privacy Policy

type.summary: Reference and link to Snap's Privacy Policy

requirements.description: The privacy policy must clearly and accurately describe what user information is accessed, collected, and stored by you and your Application

type.summary: Transparency in data access, collection, and storage

requirements.description: The privacy policy must explain how and why you and your Application use, process, and share user information with Snap and other third parties

type.summary: Explanation of data usage, processing, and sharing

requirements.description: Users may provide information directly to Snap through your implementation of the Snap Developer Program

type.summary: Direct information provision by users to Snap

requirements.description: You must not provide Snap with any personal data unless otherwise agreed to in writing by you and Snap

type.summary: No personal data sharing without written agreement
